item.title: The Immorality of Absolute Morality
item.description: The RPG space is once more grappling with the existence of virulent racists in the space. In short, Goodman Games is working with Judges Guild (headed by a known racist and anti-semite) to publish a revival of City State of the Invincible Overlord, a classic D&D module. The general tenor of the reaction on their two statements would have you believe it is as cut-and-dry as that; the reality is, of course, a bit hairier.
